channel.title: Help please!
channel.description: ok when i go to post my server on the mopar server status list.. it keeps saying my servers offline and its not.. idk what to do? or where i can post my server i really want people to play on it! can anyone help or please ask for my forums and stuff.

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

You log into localhost, or 127.0.0.1, doesn’t matter which one, as to they are the same. But you have to use your hamachi ip for the server status, and other people have to use the hamachi ip to log in.

Read full topic

item.description:

i have hamachi and where do i change the ip i log into and what do i need to change?

Read full topic

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

Mod Franklin:

you are probraly logging into (127.0.1) Local Host

Lol, local host is 127.0.0.1, and that has nothing to do with the server status not showing his server up.

doup22:

ok when i go to post my server on the mopar server status list… it keeps saying my servers offline and its not… idk what to do? or where i can post my server i really want people to play on it! can anyone help or please ask for my forums and stuff.

Go into your modem, and look at the ports. Make sure you portfowarded correctly, and enabled it.
Also, try making exceptions in your firewall, or closing the firewall for a while. And make sure you used the correct ip on the server status page.

If your still having problems, feel free to pm me at anytime. I’ll be glad to help with anything.

Read full topic
